Sentencas: Auxiliary power units (APUs) are devices that can provide all or part of the non-propulsion power of a vehicle.
Titulo: Impacts assessment and trade-offs of fuel cell-based auxiliary power units Part I: System performance and cost modeling

Sentencas: They do not replace the main internal combustion engine, but they complement it offering low consumption, high comfort and low emissions during the idling periods of the vehicle.
Titulo: Impacts assessment and trade-offs of fuel cell-based auxiliary power units Part I: System performance and cost modeling

Sentencas: This work presents an integrated framework to evaluate the trade-offs between cost effectiveness, efficiency and health and environmental impacts of fuel cell power systems considering various stages of the life cycle of the device.
Titulo: Impacts assessment and trade-offs of fuel cell-based auxiliary power units Part I: System performance and cost modeling

Sentencas: The integrated framework has six main components, namely system level modeling, cost modeling, environmental impact assessment, health impact assessment, life cycle assessment and multi-objective optimization.
Titulo: Impacts assessment and trade-offs of fuel cell-based auxiliary power units Part I: System performance and cost modeling

Sentencas: In part I of these two papers, concerning the integrated framework, the first two components are described and applied to a solid oxide fuel cell-based auxiliary power unit.
Titulo: Impacts assessment and trade-offs of fuel cell-based auxiliary power units Part I: System performance and cost modeling

Sentencas: All the results are validated with experimental data or other published models.
Titulo: Impacts assessment and trade-offs of fuel cell-based auxiliary power units Part I: System performance and cost modeling
